personalIntroBody:
I started at the bottom of the ladder with Bluerush in 2016, tasked with entering content on static websites. Initially, I self-taught myself the basics of HTML, CSS, and JS. Later, I received support from an exceptional senior team.

Recognizing my eagerness to learn, I was entrusted with increasingly complex projects. This allowed me to apply best practices in development and programming.

I also have strong customer service skills and enjoy working in a team. I consider myself versatile and take pleasure in learning new approaches.
